description:
root@controller:/var/tmp# euca-run-instances -t m1.small ami-tiny
TypeError: _format_instances() takes exactly 2 arguments (3 given)

This may only be a problem in the EC2 api.
title: run_instances broken in trunk: problem with _format_instances passed too many arguments
